name: Adriana Aviation
about: Adriana Aviation, based in Watorowo, Poland, is one of the country's oldest and most reputable private aviation schools, established in 1992. Specializing in comprehensive flight training from PPL to ATPL, the school offers modular courses such as CPL ME/IR and UPRT. With a team of highly experienced instructors, many of whom are ex-military and commercial pilots, Adriana Aviation ensures top-notch training. The school boasts modern facilities, including classrooms, simulators, and an on-site maintenance center, as well as comfortable accommodation for students. Known for its flexible scheduling and competitive prices, Adriana Aviation has a stellar pass rate record and a commitment to producing professional pilots with a strong emphasis on safety. The school's supportive environment and excellent social facilities make it an ideal choice for aspiring commercial pilots.
